named-query.name: SitRuoloTarsu.getListaRuoliByCF
named-query.query: select d from SitRuoloTarsu d where d.codfisc= :codfisc order by d.anno, d.tipo

named-query.name: SitRuoloTarsuImm.getListaImmByCodRuolo
named-query.query: select s from SitRuoloTarsuImm s where s.idExtRuolo= :idExtRuolo order by to_number(s.prog)

named-query.name: SitRuoloTarsuRata.getListaRateByCodRuolo
named-query.query: select s from SitRuoloTarsuRata s where s.idExtRuolo= :idExtRuolo order by to_number(s.prog)

named-query.name: SitRuoloTarsuSt.getListaStByCodRuolo
named-query.query: select s from SitRuoloTarsuSt s where s.idExtRuolo= :idExtRuolo order by to_number(s.prog)

named-query.name: SitRuoloTarsuStSg.getListaSgraviByCodRuolo
named-query.query: select s from SitRuoloTarsuStSg s where s.idExtRuolo= :idExtRuolo order by to_number(s.prog)
